functions.tag: {display:{Name:'{"text":"Fireball","color":"red","bold":true,"italic":true}',Lore:['{"text":"Tier 1","color":"light_purple","bold":true}','{"text":"Conjures a fireball for the caster to use as they please.","color":"dark_purple","italic":true}']},HideFlags:1,SpellBook:1b,Uses:-1,spellData:{Spell:"Fireball",Ritual:0b,MaxUses:-1,LimitedUse:0b},Enchantments:[{}],title:"Fireball",author:"Firemaster Ignis",generation:3,resolved:1b,pages:['{"text":"Cast!","color":"gold","bold":true,"italic":true,"clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"/trigger cast_spell set 1"}}','{"text":"\\"Let it be known that the fire shall scorch the land, and the world born anew.\\"","color":"gold","italic":true}','[{"text":"\\"Bahl ouf fyr, Iy suhmn ty!\\"","color":"gold","bold":true,"italic":true},{"text":"\\n\\n(Ball of fire, I summon you!)"}]']}

{display:{Name:'{"text":"Earthbind","color":"dark_red","bold":true,"italic":true}',Lore:['{"text":"Tier 1","color":"light_purple","bold":true}','{"text":"Tendrils of earth trap nearby foes, slowing them and preventing them from jumping.","color":"dark_purple","italic":true}']},HideFlags:1,SpellBook:1b,Uses:-1,spellData:{Spell:"Earthbind",Ritual:0b,MaxUses:-1,LimitedUse:0b},Enchantments:[{}],title:"Earthbind",author:"Earthmaster Jabhar",generation:3,resolved:1b,pages:['{"text":"Cast!","color":"gold","bold":true,"italic":true,"clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"/trigger cast_spell set 1"}}','{"text":"\\"Tendrils of earth snatched the beast from the sky, dragging it down so that the ground forces could fight it on even footing.\\"","color":"gold","italic":true}','[{"text":"\\"Tyndrels ouf erre, gryp myn ene!\\"","color":"gold","bold":true,"italic":true},{"text":"\\n\\n(Tendrils of earth, grasp my enemies!)"}]']}

{display:{Name:'{"text":"Radiant Sight","color":"white","bold":true,"italic":true}',Lore:['{"text":"Tier 1","color":"light_purple","bold":true}','{"text":"The eyes of the caster glow with light, allowing them to see in the dark for a short time.","color":"dark_purple","italic":true}']},HideFlags:1,SpellBook:1b,Uses:-1,spellData:{Spell:"Radiant Sight",Ritual:0b,MaxUses:-1,LimitedUse:0b},Enchantments:[{}],title:"Radiant Sight",author:"Lightmaster Caelum",generation:3,resolved:1b,pages:['{"text":"Cast!","color":"gold","bold":true,"italic":true,"clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"/trigger cast_spell set 1"}}','{"text":"\\"From this light, all lies shall be cast aside, and the truth revealed.\\"","color":"gold","italic":true}','[{"text":"\\"Noh, Iy seeh!\\"","color":"gold","bold":true,"italic":true},{"text":"\\n\\n(Now, I see!)"}]']}

{display:{Name:'{"text":"Lightning Bolt","color":"yellow","bold":true,"italic":true}',Lore:['{"text":"Tier 1","color":"light_purple","bold":true}','{"text":"Calls forth a lightning bolt to damage foes.","color":"dark_purple","italic":true}']},HideFlags:1,SpellBook:1b,Uses:-1,spellData:{Spell:"Lightning Bolt",Ritual:0b,MaxUses:-1,LimitedUse:0b},Enchantments:[{}],title:"Lightning Bolt",author:"Thundermaster Baanon",generation:3,resolved:1b,pages:['{"text":"Cast!","color":"gold","bold":true,"italic":true,"clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"/trigger cast_spell set 1"}}','{"text":"\\"Let it be known that the lightning shall purge our enemies from this planet; be it spider, zombie, or creeper, nothing shall stand in our way.\\"","color":"gold","italic":true}','[{"text":"\\"Azit ekele balt, stryke myn ene!\\"","color":"gold","bold":true,"italic":true},{"text":"\\n\\n(Great electric bolt, strike my enemies!)"}]']}

{display:{Name:'{"text":"Summon Dust Devil","color":"dark_red","bold":true,"italic":true}',Lore:['{"text":"Tier 1","color":"light_purple","bold":true}','{"text":"Summons a Dust Devil; a pestering, imp-like elemental that can travel through blocks and blind its foes with dust.","color":"dark_purple","italic":true}']},HideFlags:1,SpellBook:1b,Uses:-1,spellData:{Spell:"Summon Dust Devil",Ritual:0b,MaxUses:-1,LimitedUse:0b},Enchantments:[{}],title:"Summon Dust Devil",author:"Earthmaster Jabhar",generation:3,resolved:1b,pages:['{"text":"Cast!","color":"gold","bold":true,"italic":true,"clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"/trigger cast_spell set 1"}}','{"text":"\\"Tendrils of earth snatched the beast from the sky, dragging it down so that the ground forces could fight it on even footing.\\"","color":"gold","italic":true}','[{"text":"\\"Tyndrels ouf erre, gryp myn ene!\\"","color":"gold","bold":true,"italic":true},{"text":"\\n\\n(Tendrils of earth, grasp my enemies!)"}]']}
